org.jacorb.orb.etf

Class ProtocolAddressBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacorb.orb.etf.ProtocolAddressBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Configurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IIOPAddress

    public abstract class ProtocolAddressBase
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Configurable
    Provides an abstraction of a protocol specific address. This is necessary to allow the ORB and other components deal with addresses generally rather than using protocol specific address elements such as IIOP-centric host and port values.
    Author:
    Phil Mesnier
